main_definition: Having a natural aptitude or skill in a particular area, especially the arts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Skillful and creative in artistic pursuits
meanings_and_examples.example: She is incredibly talented at playing the piano.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Able to perform tasks with exceptional proficiency or ease
meanings_and_examples.example: He's very talented when it comes to cooking; he can whip up a gourmet meal without needing any recipes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having an inherent ability or aptitude for something
meanings_and_examples.example: The young athletes are all incredibly talented, each excelling in their respective sports.
